title: Add WinXP to WinPE3 BCD file

forumNotes.author: briang
forumNotes.content:
I would like to add my WinXP install on the c: drive to the BCD (Boot menu) for my bootable WinPE USB flash drive. I would like to do this, because after the windows installation files are copied locally to the c: drive, I would like the USB boot drive to boot to the C: drive by default. This is mostly useful for the laptops that do not have built-in "boot menu" which allow me to boot to usb without changing the boot priority in the BIOS.  

I tried to add the {legacy} entry via the bcdedit utility, but I am getting errors when I try to add a "timeout" value and also receiving errors when attempting to set the {legacy} boot option as the default value.  

Any HELP is much appreciated.. !!!
